venue.name: The Asgard Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description:
Attention Boston, you are invited to the biggest party of the year.....Australia Day 2013, brought to you by the Boston Demons!

What can you expect?

- Aussie beer
- Live Aussie music
- Meat pies
- Lots of giveaways
- The Annual 'Peter Garrett-off' Dance Party
- Prizes for the best dressed (individual & group costumes)
- 400+ people celebrating the greatest day of the year!

Entry can be pre-purchased for $10 online, while entry at the door will be $15 (link will be posted when it's ready). All are welcome and encouraged to party with us regardless of nationality!

So join us at the Asgard in Cambridge for what is set to be the best Australia Day ever!

http://www.facebook.com/events/345042628936720/

Save $5 by reserving your entry online:

http://www.bostondemons.com/events.php

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Australia Day 2013
